text: mava# rundhE maddhyaqtO dhAqtAra#M karOti maddhyaqta EqvainaqM grAma#sya dadhAtyEqtA Eqva nirva#pEqjjyOgA#mayAvIq CandA(gm)#siq vai dEvi#kAqSCandA(gm)#siq Kaluq vA EqtamaqBi ma#nyantEq yasyaq jyOgAqmaya#tiq CandO#BirEqvaina#-magaqdaM ka#rOti maddhyaqtO dhAqtAra#M karOti maddhyaqtO vA EqtasyAklRu#ptaqM ~Myasyaq jyOgAqmaya#ti maddhyaqta EqvAsyaq tEna# kalpayatyEqtA Eqva ni - [  ]   31
